name: LX Patterns
description:
How smart are you? The ability to recognize patterns is often analyzed in IQ tests. LX patterns is a puzzle game in which you have to identify different patterns while listening to a relaxing soundtrack.

Key features:

  • 60 levels with different types of patterns
  • Minimalist style
  • Relaxing soundtrack
  • Fair difficulty
  • Steam achievements
  • No time pressure
  • Dark and light themes
